title: Small Farm Irrigation - Video 4 - How to Patch a Lay Flat Header Pipe

tasks.task: Patching a lay flat header pipe
subtasks: Cut the lay flat pipe to expose the leak (cut in half over the leak)
Obtain a coupling or bob splice fitting
Position clamps on both sides of the pipe
Insert the bob splice fitting into each side of the pipe
Align the cut edges of the lay flat pipe over the fitting
Apply a lubricant (e.g., Vaseline or vegetable oil) to facilitate sliding
Adjust pipe clamps past the barbs
Secure the clamps with a screwdriver
Verify the repair by checking for leaks after reactivating water flow
